mesh.description: The index of the mesh from which to build the collision representation.

skin.description: The index of a skin with which to deform the mesh.

weights.description: The weights of the instantiated morph target.

useNodeWeights.description: Use weights supplied by a node which references this geometry. When true, a node referencing this object **MUST** have a weights property, the length of which which **MUST** match the number of morph targets of the weights of the mesh referenced by this object.
